result.execSummary:
The defendant Mai Thao was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess w/ Intent-Amphetamine(>10-50g) [Modifiers: Second or Subsequent Offense], a class D felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1m)(e)3.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes: No contact with G.M. to be lifted at agent's discretion.
Assessment, treatment, counseling as recommended.  AODA and follow up.  Complete SAFE program.  DNA sample.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

from A.Z. to NTC

Case called: 2:41 pm
INCLUDES 16CF698, 16CF739, 15CF365.
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo:
Defendant appearsin custody and with Atty Nicholas Carroll and Atty John Wallace;

PLEA/SENTENCING HEARING ON 16CF698 AND 16CF739:
VRCW. Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights & Counsel filed. State moves to:
16CF698:
Ct. 1 (False Imprisonment-Domestic Abuse)>>DRI.
Ct. 2 (Strangulation and Suffocation-Domestic Abuse)>>DRI.
Ct. 4 (Battery-Domestic Abuse)>>DRI.
Ct. 8 (Disorderly Conduct-Domestic Abuse)>>DRI.

16CF739:
Ct. 3 (Disorderly Conduct-Domestic Abuse)>>DRI.
COURT GRANTS ABOVE.

PLEA: 
16CF698:
Ct. 3 (BJ-Felony)>> NO CONTEST.
Ct. 5 (Disorderly Conduct-Domestic Abuse)>> NO CONTEST.
Ct. 6 (BJ-Felony)>> NO CONTEST.
Ct. 7 (Battery-Domestic Abuse)>> NO CONTEST.

16CF739:
Ct. 1 (BJ-Felony)>> NO CONTEST.
Ct. 2 (Battery-Domestic Abuse)>> NO CONTEST.

Crt advises def of rights & penalties & ques def to understanding.  Crt finds plea & waiver freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.  

COURT ORDERS: 
16CF698:
Ct. 3 (BJ-Felony)>> 3 Years WSPS, 1 Year IC and 2 Years ES, CONCURRENT TO 16CF739 and CONSECUTIVE TO 15CF365. CONDITIONS: Assessment/treatment/counseling as recommended, AODA and Follow up, Complete the SAFE Program, Maintain Full time work/Full time school or a combination, No Contact with G.M. to be lifted at the agent's discretion, Court Costs including DNA Surcharge, DNA Sample. COURT FINDS 172 Days Credit. Defendant is eligible for CIP and SAP.

Ct. 5 (Disorderly Conduct-Domestic Abuse)>> 30 Days MCJ w/Huber privileges for work/school/treatment or a combination, CONCURRENT TO 16CF739 and CONSECUTIVE TO 15CF365. Court Costs including DNA Surcharge and DV Surcharge, DNA Sample. COURT FINDS 172 Days Credit.

Ct. 6 (BJ-Felony)>> 3 Years WSPS, 1 Year IC and 2 Years ES, CONCURRENT TO 16CF739 and CONSECUTIVE TO 15CF365. CONDITIONS: Assessment/treatment/counseling as recommended, AODA and Follow up, Complete the SAFE Program, Maintain Full time work/Full time school or a combination, No Contact with G.M. to be lifted at the agent's discretion, Court Costs including DNA Surcharge, DNA Sample. COURT FINDS 172 Days Credit. Defendant is eligible for CIP and SAP.

Ct. 7 (Battery-Domestic Abuse)>> 9 Months MCJ w/Huber privileges for work/school/treatment or a combination, CONCURRENT  TO 16CF739 and CONSECUTIVE TO 15CF365. Court Costs including DNA Surcharge and DV Surcharge, DNA Sample. COURT FINDS 172 Days Credit.

16CF739:
Ct. 1 (BJ-Felony)>> 3 Years WSPS, 1 Year IC and 2 Years ES, CONCURRENT TO 16CF698 and CONSECUTIVE TO 15CF365. CONDITIONS: Assessment/treatment/counseling as recommended, AODA and Follow up, Complete the SAFE Program, Maintain Full time work/Full time school or a combination, No Contact with G.M. to be lifted at the agent's discretion, Court Costs including DNA Surcharge, DNA Sample. COURT FINDS 172 Days Credit. Defendant is eligible for CIP and SAP.

Ct. 2 (Battery-Domestic Abuse)>>  9 Months MCJ w/Huber privileges for work/school/treatment or a combination, CONCURRENT TO 16CF698 and CONSECUTIVE TO 15CF365. Court Costs including DNA Surcharge and DV Surcharge, DNA Sample. COURT FINDS 172 Days Credit.

SENTENCING HEARING IN 15CF365:

COURT ORDERS:
15CF365:
Ct. 1 (Possess w/Intent-Amphetamine-Second or Subsequent Offense)>>  6 Years WSPS, 3 Year IC and 3 Years ES, CONSECUTIVE TO 16CF698 AND 16CF739. CONDITIONS: Assessment/treatment/counseling as recommended, AODA and Follow up, Complete the SAFE Program, Maintain Full time work/Full time school or a combination, No Contact with G.M. to be lifted at the agent's discretion, Court Costs including DNA Surcharge, DNA Sample. COURT FINDS 7 Days Credit. Defendant is eligible for CIP and SAP.

PSI TO BE SEALED.

Adjourned: 3:05 pm
Sentencing hearing on December 9, 2016 at 02:00 pm.
